synopsis.text: Marika's life takes an unexpected turn when she learns that her late father was not just a notorious space pirate, but the captain of the infamous Bentenmaru. As the heir to her father's legacy, Marika is suddenly thrust into a world of intergalactic piracy, inheriting both the ship and its crew. With her only naval experience being her involvement in her school's space yacht club, Marika must decide whether to embrace her new life as a space pirate or continue her ordinary life as a high school student and part-time cafe worker. The decision becomes even more complicated as government agencies and a mysterious transfer student take an interest in her new role. With the crew of the Bentenmaru eager to maintain their status as a feared name in space, Marika must navigate the challenges of high school and high seas in this thrilling adventure.
